summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Queen Anne 2nd Addition, being the alley between 10th avenue West and 11th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105059 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
